headline: Lam Research (LRCX): Valuation Update Following Major JSR Deal and Next-Gen Chip Packaging Launch
summary: Lam Research (LRCX) is getting plenty of buzz this week after announcing a new cross-licensing and collaboration agreement with JSR Corporation, as well as the rollout of a new deposition tool targeting next-generation chip packaging. For investors, it is not just another partnership but a bold move aimed at making Lam an indispensable player as the semiconductor industry races to meet surging demand for AI and high-performance computing chips. The strategic focus on dry resist EUV...

headline: Stifel Maintains Buy on Lam Research (LAM) Amid Growing eSSD and NAND Market Demand
summary: Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) ranks among the best fast growth stocks to buy now. Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) maintained its Buy rating at Stifel on September 9 as the firm issued an updated report on the Americas Semiconductors, Processors, and Components sector. Stifel noted that hyperscaler estimates are improving, which may improve Lam Research’s position […]
